commit message: license boilerplate added to source files

fix: API 11 numberpicker didn't save new number when changed via
keyboard (fixed by clearing focus before getting the value)
fix: settings not saved due to different processes

added 'turn wifi on when power connected' and 'don't turn wifi on when
in airplane mode' feature
min before turning off wifi when out of range is now configurable

USER_PRESENT is sometimes not sent -> also listen for SCREEN_ON
broadcast
don't send SCREEN_ON if the screen is locked

fix: both 'turn wifi off when display goes off' and 'turn wifi on on
unlock' setting were enabled as soon as one of these were enabled
turn on every ... values changed to allow 5, 15 & 30 mins

Stop screen off timer when receiving ACTION_USER_PRESENT or SCREEN_ON_ACTION

The screen off timer was not stopped, if 'enable wifi on unlock' was not
set. Therefore the wifi was turned off, even if the screen was disabled
only a few seconds.

Changed preferences were not used immediately

The 'Receiver' service did not always use the updated preferences
immediately

Only start timers when not already running

If the screen was turned off and then on again without unlocking the
screen, the timer was not stopped (since on ACTION_USER_PRESENT was
sent), but restarted when the screen was off again.

reverted last commit: AS automatically adds that excludeFolder again :(

check WifiP2pInfo on P2P connection change
moved handling of USER_PRESENT broadcast in separate receiver, which can be disabled if that option is not used

added set(Millisecond, 0) to all timers which should fire at a specific time to avoid duplicate alarms for those
polish translation, thanks to Jaroslaw Pietras
fix: screen on command send to wrong receiver
changed some option titles (too long for small devices)
added option to enable wifi at certain locations
added separate build flavor for f-droid version without play services
moved billing permission to play flavor
added warning to locations page if timeout is too short
update only when replaced package equals own packagename
update no network timeout summary onresume
check if location settings are enabled
check for screen state when restarting service
fixed issue with wrong date set for OFF alarm
replaced FEATURE_TELEPHONY with FEATURE_LOCATION_NETWORK for enabling/disabling the location options
fixed alarms not set again after 1st execution
